title: help
body:
Can someone tell me how to change English voice to Japanese voice in OCE? 

Thank you very much

replies.body:
Go to the folder C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system
Open the file **locale.cfg**.

if you want it to be japanese put
**locale = ja_jp**

then save, open the launcher and let the game patch. it needs to patch all the sound files etc and the latest patch. Saving item sets before changing your language is recommended.

Let me know if that works.
